name: Hyrule Warriors: Age of Calamity - Wave 2: Guardian of Remembrance
summary: In Wave 2, experience a newly playable character duo, additional stages, and new story sequences. Defend Hyrule as the quirky duo character, Purah & Robbie, and their array of ancient technology. See how places like the Coliseum and Kakariko Village looked 100 years in the past in brand-new story stages. And learn more about the Champions and the mysterious Guardian in emotional new story sequences as the fight for Hyrule’s future continues.
